clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in acne herpes labialis infections cold sores and venereal disease

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: PCL 016 or Picolinic acid drug substance is a pyridine carboxylate metabolite of tryptophan It acts as an anti infective and immunomodulator through its role in zinc transport ZFPs are involved in viral replication and packaging as well as normal cell homeostatic functions Picolinic acid has been shown to be an anti viral in vitro and in vivo
